name: EcoManiac!
description:
EcoManiac! Is my attempt to Tower Defense games. Your goal is to protect your tree from horrible orcs that decided to cut it down... Your goal is to protect it long enough for it to become Biggest tree Ever. You can upgrade your damage when u aske Andre who is located in the right bottom of the map. Good Luck and Have Fun.

Controls

WSAD - Move

I - Attack Upwards

J- Attack Left

K- Attack Down

L - Attack Right
